He said the changes would help clarify the individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company . However, Mr Eric Schmidt reassured investors that he does not expect any`` material change'' in the way the company is run because`` we tend to agree on pretty much everything''.

AU has recognised Alassane Ouattara as president but there are splits emerging with some nations less eager in their support and a number unhappy at the prospect of ECOWAS ousting Gbagbo by force, as has been threatened. A military operation which only targets Gbagbo and the soldiers supporting him will spare us civilian casualties, Guillaume Soro, a former rebel leader named Alassane Ouattara 's prime minister, said in Zambia on Wednesday.
